_comment: Lambda function configuration for polizalab-opportunity-handler. Mirrors the runtime and patterns used by lead-handler (Python 3.12, handler.handler). The deploy-opportunities.sh script reads this file to create or update the function.
description: Handles all CRUD operations for the Opportunities feature of PolizaLab CRM. Manages opportunity creation, stage advancement, close-won/close-lost transitions, quote management, and activity auto-triggers.
